class.name: NativeAudioStream
class.comment: note: this file used to do the real header reading and format verification for .au files (the only kind supported). now we are way more cool than that and don't need this functionality here; i'm just gutting this class and letting it contain an ACIS instead (so now it should work for all the data types we support....).
class.javadoc: A Sun-specific AudioStream that supports native audio formats.
